availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Raley (Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Wilson Raley. Married to Elizabeth Iler Raley in Ohio County, Kentucky. Father of James W. Raley, Lucy A. Raley. Farmer in Hartford, Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky,Caney, p. 146.
Find A Grave, "John Raley (Oct. 8, 1806-Aug. 11, 1884)," Memorial #150638953 , http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/150638953 (accessed January 11, 2019).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Ohio County Marriages, Film 000494956, p. 179.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Ohio County Marriages, Film 000494956, p. 31.
